original_text: We have heard bad news about what is happening among you. Some of you are having sex in wrong ways. We have heard that one man is even having sex with his own father's wife! Even people who do not know God do not do things as bad as that! Corinthians 4 Corinthians 6
korean_text: 너희 중에 심지어 음행이 있다 함을 들으니 그런 음행은 이방인 중에서도 없는 것이라 누가 그 아버지의 아내를 취하였다 하는도다

sentences.original_text: about what is happening among you
Some of you are having sex in wrong ways
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분 중 일부는 잘못된 방법으로 성관계를 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We have heard that one man
is even having sex with his own father's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 자기 아버지의 아내와 성관계를 가지고 있다는

sentences.original_text: Even people who do not know God
do not do things as bad as that
